summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of East 50 feet of the West 187 feet of the South 130 feet of the North 170 feet of the Northwest one-quarter of the Northwest one-quarter of the Southwest one-quarter of Section 23, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M., with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-108 and 17-79, respectively.
